pullrequest.title: Add schematic view to model editor

content.raw:
I've been trying to reproduce it but can't seem to get this assert. I also ran tests 100 times to make sure it's not a race condition. At this point, I am inclined to leave it like this and ticket an issue for it in case it happens again.

If anyone know how to stop asserts from upstream library from crashing gazebo, we could do probably add that in.
content.html:
I've been trying to reproduce it but can't seem to get this assert. I also ran tests 100 times to make sure it's not a race condition. At this point, I am inclined to leave it like this and ticket an issue for it in case it happens again.

If anyone know how to stop asserts from upstream library from crashing gazebo, we could do probably add that in.
